nodes.text: Zardossa Stix was a moon with a desert climate, located near Bardotta. It had a spaceport village which Mace Windu and Jar Jar Binks visited while tracking the Frangawl Cult that had kidnapped the Queen of Bardotta, Julia. The moon also featured a pyramid called the Temple of Malmourral, which was used by the Frangawl Cult, as well as their leader, Mother Talzin, as part of a ceremony to drain the Living Force from members of the Dagoyan Order.
